column4: when kubuntu upgraded the kernel package, the installation process over-wrote my menu.lst, erasing a couple of my entries, forcing me to enter them in by hand.  has anyone mentioned this to the maintainers and thought about perhaps coming up with a better way for the package to act?
yes and it replaces w/ UUID crap
pissed me off as well, i have other entries for OS's as wel
yeah.  it's a ridiculous way to do things.
